data.text: O God, Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba nɨn nguazimɨn ize.
Me nɨn gumazamizibav soghezɨ me ariaghirezɨ,
Me nɨn gumazamizibav soghezɨ me ariaghirezɨ,
Gumazamizir en boroghɨra itiba e dɨpova, en ingaravaka,
O Ikiavɨra Itir God, nɨ en ataravɨra iti o?
Nɨ kantrin nɨ gɨfozir puvatɨgha nɨ ko mɨgeir puvatɨziba,
Me kamaghɨn amua, Jekopɨn ovavir boriba bar me mɨsuagharigha,
Nɨ en inazir afeziaba amizir arazir kurabagh nɨghnighɨva, pazɨva e damuan markɨ.
O God, nɨ Godɨn En Akurvazim.
O God, Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba manmaghsu kamagh e mɨkɨmam,
Nɨ kalabusɨn itir gumazamizibar ararem baragh.
O Ekiam, apanir kaba akar kurabar nɨ mɨkeme.
Nɨn gumazamizir nɨn sipsipbar mɨn itiba,
